title: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor
description: The action of reverting changes in the Java editor is significantly slower compared to closing and reopening the file.
OB: When I answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog, and then double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it, the file is reopened quickly. However, if I repeat steps 1) and 2) and then select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes 15 seconds for the contents of the editor window to be replaced with the original content.
